New Records: Fakhar Zaman returned to the side and top-scored with 81
Key Match Events: Miraz a highlight with three wickets
Mahmudullah fell just after his fifty
Das and Shakib fell in the 40s
Pre-Game Insights: Babar Azam’s side ended their four-match losing streak with the win
All credit to the boys and the way we are playing”, said Azam
We know when Fakhar is playing, its a different ball game
So he played his natural game and all the pressure is on their team
Post-Match Reflections: The wicket was really good and we lost wickets again early on”, he said
From there on there was some partnership but not a big enough one that we could go hard in the last ten overs
At this moment, we have to perform together
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan captain Babar Azam’s side ended their four-match losing streak with the win
It keeps alive their chances of progressing to the semifinals
Fakhar Zaman returned to the side and top-scored with 81
I practised a lot and was feeling good in the camp and was looking forward to scoring runs for the team”, he said
Others: Two singles end the contest in the 33rd over
Rizwan with the winning run dropped into the covers
